teammembers.description: Belvedere Hotels by Marriott allows guests to experience 4-star hospitality in an ideal location overlooking the waterfront in London. Situated in the vibrant downtown district of London, this hotel offers spacious, modern rooms and suites. On-site parking is free. To make it short, this hotel was absolutely awesome. On-site parking is free. To make it short, this hotel was absolutely awesome.

Across the street from the Four Seasons Centre of Performing Arts. On-site parking is free. To make it short, this hotel was absolutely awesome. On-site parking is free. Rooms feature complimentary WiFi, a work area with desk, a coffee maker, and the addition of luxury bath products. On-site parking is free. To make it short, this hotel was absolutely awesome.
